generalContextPrompt.name: General Context
generalContextPrompt.description: Provide some general context that you want to inform the AI about for all chat requests. E.g. Your background, skills, expertise, interests, work, values, goals, priorities.
generalContextPrompt.prePrompt: Take the following general context into consideration if relevant and appropriate when responding

responseGuidancePrompt.name: Response Guidance
responseGuidancePrompt.description: Provide some content guidelines for the AI to follow when responding to chat requests. E.g. The response should be concise, clear, factual, friendly, professional, respectful, empathetic, supportive, assertive, encouraging, positive, constructive, helpful, creative, original, engaging, include examples.
responseGuidancePrompt.prePrompt: The content of the response should follow these guidelines

responseFormatPrompt.name: Response Format
responseFormatPrompt.description: Provide some format guidelines for the AI to follow when responding to chat requests. E.g. provide the response as a plain text / markdown / as a chat with follow-up questions / as a formal report / if its a long answer always provide a summary first
responseFormatPrompt.prePrompt: The response should follow these formatting guidelines

customSystemPrompt.name: Custom System Prompt
customSystemPrompt.description: Provide an additional system prompt to be included with each chat request.
